message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know you've been interested in. This product is worth at least $1,000,000 to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. I'm willing to let it go for $1,050,000. This is a great deal, considering its true worth. Let me know if you're interested, as I have another interested party ready to buy it for $1,000,000.
